entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 5:38AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Storm To Hit West Coast of Alaska Sunday Night And Monday... A very strong storm moving northeast across the Bering Sea on Sunday will move to the Northern Bering Sea on Monday, and then to between St Lawrence Island and the Bering Strait on Tuesday. This storm will bring snow and strong winds to St Lawrence Island

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: A light freeze is likely over the Big Country southward to Sterling City...Robert Lee...Ballinger and Brownwood, late tonight into early Sunday morning. A brief dip below freezing, of 30 to 32 degrees is likely between 5 AM and 8 AM, with the coldest readings of 28 degrees across Haskell and Throckmorton counties. Any sensitive or tender plants may need to be taken in, or protected.
